Articles.Content:
I speak for everyone here when I say, Kerbals are the most adorable thing to ever be created by Man. But, I think they are in need of a much serious revamp. Their textures, the way they move, Their lack of In-game Chatter, and Not to mention their creepy unblinking stare... Any chance that someone can make Kerbals look more serious and bold, rather then their unusually humorous, cartoony appearance...

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-10T05:31:51Z" title="07/10/2015 05:31  AM" data-short="9 yr">July 10, 2015</time> by LordLemonFaceOfLemonistan**

That'd unfortunately require us to be able to access the Kerbal model, which as of yet we cannot. 

However, Texture Replacer headpacks do make up for it some small way, as at least then they have more facial features. Chatterer also makes up for their silence a bit, even on EVA.
